definitions.definition: A groom , or servant with responsibility for the horses.
usually syce : chauffeur , driver . A 1919 photograph of M. C. Westerman, Mr. and Mrs. Soeters, and a chauffeur, in Ambarawa , Central Java , Dutch East Indies

main_definition: ( chiefly India ) A groom , or servant with responsibility for the horses.
secondary_definitions: ( Malaya , dated ) usually syce : chauffeur , driver . A 1919 photograph of M. C. Westerman, Mr. and Mrs. Soeters, and a chauffeur, in Ambarawa , Central Java , Dutch East Indies
